app.name: RoamWise
search.title: Find Places

search.ready_desc: Enter what you're looking for above and our AI will find personalized recommendations!
search.no_results_hint: Try a different search term or location.
search.error_hint: Unable to connect to search service. Please try again.
ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.subtitle: Voice-powered travel companion
trip.title: Plan Your Trip
trip.subtitle: AI-powered trip planning with personalized recommendations
trip.configure_hint: Configure your preferences above and generate a personalized itinerary!
trip.error_hint: Unable to generate trip plan. Please try again.
profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Your travel preferences and history
insight.rain_change_route: today. You may want to consider indoor activities or changing your route.
insight.rain_generic: Rain is expected. Consider bringing an umbrella or waterproof jacket.
insight.cold: It might be chilly. Bring a warm jacket.
insight.very_cold: It will be very cold. Dress warmly with layers, hat, and gloves.
insight.hot: It will be hot today. Stay hydrated, wear sunscreen, and take breaks in the shade.
insight.altitude: It will be colder up in the hills. Bring warm layers even if it's nice at the base.
insight.windy: Strong winds expected. Secure loose items and consider windproof clothing.
insight.snow: Snow is expected. Check road conditions and consider alternative routes.
insight.good: Perfect conditions for your trip. Enjoy!
